author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-1563 regression.  LinkSubmit async operations were broken by placing using a href="#" directive.  Took the opportunity to refactor some and now have the href="" pointing to a valid url (even if it would definitely give you a stale link exception if that's all you sent to the server) and used the attribute in the real onClick capture.
